text: al-yawma uhilla lakumu l-tayibatu wataʿamu alladhina utu l-kitaba hillun lakum wataʿamukum hillun lahum wal-muh'sanatu mina l-mu'minati wal-muh'sanatu mina alladhina utu l-kitaba min qablikum idha ataytumuhunna ujurahunna muh'sinina ghayra musafihina wala muttakhidhi akhdanin waman yakfur bil-imani faqad habita ʿamaluhu wahuwa fi l-akhirati mina l-khasirina
